data.title: GLS Pošljipaket
data.text:
GLS business units throughout Slovenia enable you to drop off and collect a parcel.

Locations and working hours of our business units (Monday to Friday):

GLS Depo Ljubljana Polje – Zadobrovška c. 75, 1260 Ljubljana Polje 8.00-10.00 in 14.00-16.00

GLS Depo Ljubljana Šiška – Drabosnjakova ulica 9e, Ljubljana- Šiška 13.00-16.00

GLS Depo Domžale – Kamniška cesta 65, 1234 Mengeš 06:00-08:00 in 14:00-16:00

GLS Depo Grosuplje – Industrijska cesta 1, Grosuplje 06:00-08:00 in 14:00-16:00

GLS Depo Vrhnika – Verd 107, Vrhnika 6.00-9.00 in 14.00-17.00

GLS Depo Unec – Unec 25, Rakek 6.00-8.00 in 15.00-17.00

GLS Depo Maribor – Kosarjeva ulica 8, Maribor 7.00-8.00 in 15.00-18.00

GLS Depo Ptuj – Spodnja Hajdina 61a, Ptuj 7.00-8.00 in 15.00-16.00

GLS Depo Kranj – Struževo 3b, Kranj 10.00 -16.00

GLS Depo Škofja Loka – Kidričeva 75, Škofja Loka 7.00-8.00 in 14.00-17.00

GLS Depo Nova Gorica – Industrijska cesta 118, Nova Gorica 6.00-9.00 in 14.00-16.30

GLS Depo Žalec – Drešinja vas 1, Petrovče 6.00-8.00 in 17.00-19.00

GLS Depo Celje – Tovorna ulica 9, Celje 14.00-16.00

GLS Depo Zagorje – Cesta 20. julija 23, 1410 Zagorje ob Savi 14:00-16:00

GLS Depo Lenart– Industrijska ulica 1, 2230 Lenart v Slovenskih Goricah 15:00-17:00

GLS Depo Tolmin – Pod klancem 6, Tolmin 7.00-8.00 in 14:00-16:00

GLS Depo Slovenj Gradec – Pameče 180, Slovenj Gradec 15.00-18.00

GLS Depo Novo mesto – Gosjakova ulica 3, Novo mesto 6:00-8:00 in 14.00-16.00

GLS Depo Krško – Cesta krških žrtev 137, Krško 7.00-9.00 in 15.00-16.00

GLS Depo Črnomelj– Kanižarica 43, Črnomelj 6.00-8.00 in 14.00-17.00

GLS Depo Koper – Ankaranska cesta 12, Koper 6.00-8.00 in 15.00-17.00

GLS Depo Murska Sobota – Plese 7c, Murska Sobota 6.00-9.00 in 14.00-17.30

GLS Depo Slovenska Bistrica – Spodnja Nova vas 47, Slovenska Bistrica 6.00-8.00 in 14.00-16.00

GLS Depo Velenje – Žarova cesta 27, Velenje 15.00-17.00

GLS HUB Ljubljana - Cesta v prod 84, Ljubljana Snebarje 6.00-21.00

In case you miss the courier and you have a parcel ready to be sent the same day, you can do it at different locations across Slovenia. Business units are accepting parcels approximately until 18.00. The procedure for sending a parcel is the same as if the courier had picked up the parcel at your home. Prepare the parcel in advance, pack it properly and stick the carriage voucher on it, and hand it in at the GLS reception point.
